entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
